quote.author: Kevin Kelly
quote.quote_text: The business plans of the next 10,000 startups are easy to forecast. Take X and add AI.

quote.author: Stephen Hawking
quote.quote_text: The development of full artificial intelligence could spell the end of the human race… It would take off on its own, and re-design itself at an ever increasing rate. Humans, who are limited by slow biological evolution, couldn't compete, and would be superseded.

quote.author: Claude Shannon
quote.quote_text: I visualize a time when we will be to robots what dogs are to humans, and I’m rooting for the machines.
